title: Privacy Policy
intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data.
data_collection_description: We collect only the necessary information to provide our services, such as your email and authentication details.
analytics_description: We use Vercel Analytics to track anonymous user interactions, such as page visits and performance metrics.
payments_description: Payments are securely processed via Stripe. We do not store your payment information.
data_sharing_description: We do not share your personal data with third parties, except when required for legal compliance.
user_rights_description: You have the right to request access, correction, or deletion of your data.
changes_description: We reserve the right to update this policy at any time. Continued use of the service implies acceptance of changes.
